value.description: Whether to use persistent BT storage or not
Whether to autoswitch to BT headset profile or not
Whether to restore device profile or not
Whether to restore device routes or not
The default volume for sink devices
The default volume for source devices
The volume level to apply when ducking (= reducing volume for a higher priority stream to be audible) in the role-based linking policy
Whether to allow metadata to move streams at runtime or not
Whether to allow streams follow the default device or not
The camera discovery timeout in milliseconds
Whether to never convert audio to F32 format or not
Whether to enable monitor ports on audio nodes or not
Whether to enable control ports on audio nodes or not
Whether to restore properties on stream nodes or not
Whether to restore target on stream nodes or not
The default volume for playback nodes
The default volume for capture nodes
A media.role to assign on streams that have none specified
Whether to forward format on filter nodes or not
Whether to restore default targets or not
